org.xchain.framework.net.protocol.resource

Class ServletContextUrlTranslationStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xchain.framework.net.protocol.resource.ServletContextUrlTranslationStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UrlTranslationStrategy

    public class ServletContextUrlTranslationStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements UrlTranslationStrategy
    UrlTranslationStrategy implementation to load resources from the servlet context. The servlet context must be set prior to use for urls to be properly translated.
    Author:
    Christian Trimble, Devon Tackett, Josh Kennedy

      • translateUrl

        public java.net.URL translateUrl(java.net.URL resourceUrl)
        Description copied from interface: UrlTranslationStrategy
        Translates a resource url into the actual url on the system. If this strategy cannot translate the resouce url, then this method should return null.
        Specified by:
        translateUrl in interface UrlTranslationStrategy
